QuestData.Title: Dun-da-Dun-tah!
QuestData.Description: Listen, kid. This is no place for you to be playin' around.$b$bI'm about to make a break for it. Stick with me and I'll get you outta here.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Harrison has escorted you to safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Harrison from Drakil'jin Ruins, then speak with Harkor at Harkor's Camp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Harkor at Harkor's Camp in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.RewardText: So, yah survived a little adventure with our good friend, did yah?$b$bThat should be reward enough in itself, but here - I'm feelin' generous.
